SCTX - Script Source:
Scn fbmwCalvusNPCScript

float timer
short DistanceCheck


begin ondeath
	set fbmwMercCalvusQuest.isdead to 1
	set fbmwMercCalvusQuest.MercenaryNear to 0
	CompleteQuest fbmwMercCalvusQuest
	StopQuest fbmwMercCalvusQuest
	return
end

begin gamemode

	if GetDead > 0
		return
	endif

	if fbmwMercCalvusQuest.info == 1
		messagebox "Our contract is for 30 days, starting %g/%g. You have %g days left in the contract." fbmwMercCalvusQuest.contractCalvusMonth fbmwMercCalvusQuest.contractCalvusDay fbmwMercCalvusQuest.ContractCalvusDaysLeft 
		set fbmwMercCalvusQuest.info to 0
	endif
	

	if fbmwMercCalvusQuest.DoShare == 1
		set fbmwMercCalvusQuest.DoShare to 2
		fbmwCalvusMercInventoryREF.Activate Player 1
		return
	elseif fbmwMercCalvusQuest.DoShare == 2
		if ( MenuMode != 2 ) && ( MenuMode != 1008 )
			set fbmwMercCalvusQuest.DoShare to 3
			fbmwCalvusMercInventoryREF.RemoveAllItems fbmwCalvusMercREF
			AddScriptPackage fbmwMercCalvusInventory
			EvaluatePackage
			return
		endif
	elseif fbmwMercCalvusQuest.DoShare == 3
		set fbmwMercCalvusQuest.DoShare to 0
		RemoveScriptPackage fbmwMercCalvusInventory
		EvaluatePackage
	endif


;this section handles changes in state when Calvus leaves a contract, either because the contract expires, or because the player has taken Calvus' stuff

;if ( GetStage fbmwMercCalvusQuest < 100 )		;if Calvus has already quit, don't do this

;	if ( fbmwMercCalvusQuest.ContractCalvus == 1 )				;if Calvus doesn't have a contract, don't do this

;		if ( fbmwMercCalvusQuest.minimumProfit < 0 )					;handles Calvus quitting because player took his stuff

;			Set fbmwMercCalvusQuest.Companion to 0
;		Set fbmwMercCalvusQuest.ContractCalvus to 0
;		    sifh 0
;			evp
;			StartConversation Player
;			return
;		else

;			if ( fbmwMercCalvusQuest.ContractCalvus == 0 )			;handles Calvus after a contract expires
;				Set fbmwMercCalvusQuest.Companion to 0
;				evp

;				if ( GetStage fbmwMercCalvusQuest < 10 )
;					SetStage fbmwMercCalvusQuest 10		;tells player the first mercenary contract is expired
;				else
;					SetStage fbmwMercCalvusQuest 20		;tells player the most recent mercenary contract is expired
;				endif

;			endif	

;		endif

;	endif

;endif

if ( fbmwMercCalvusQuest.companion == 0 )
	return
endif


if ( timer < 3 )
	set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
	return	
endif

if ( GetDistance Player < 500 )
	set DistanceCheck to 0
endif
set timer to 0
return

if ( DistanceCheck == 0 )
	Say fbmwCalvusMercDist 1
	set DistanceCheck to 1
endif


end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 123 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
